title: Application of Intentional Systematic Pedagogy for Graduate-Level Mathematics Research Mentoring

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge in mathematical theory and research methodologies
context.additional_context: Targeting Office/Administrative Professionals, Digital Device-Enabled Environment, Project-Based Assessment

learning_goals: In research mentoring, learners can recognize power gaps and explain three or more strategies for building collaborative relationships
Apply intentional systematic pedagogy to develop step-by-step mentoring plans from research topic selection to outcome derivation
Design and implement two or more discursive practice strategies to resolve communication issues in mathematical research processes
Propose methods for utilizing digital tools to track research progress and provide feedback in self-directed learning environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
